snippet: Every year when a Triple Crown is on the line, three women usually gather at Belmont Park, each wearing a corsage — they form an exclusive club of Triple Crown horse owners.
abstract: Every year when a Triple Crown is on the line, three women usually gather at Belmont Park, each wearing a corsage — they form an exclusive club of Triple Crown horse owners.

headline.main: An Exclusive Club: Garlands and Corsages
